field.label: Domain
field.help: Domain to override (NOTE: this does not have to be a valid TLD!), e.g. 'test' or 'mycompany.localdomain' or '1.168.192.in-addr.arpa'

field.label: IP address
field.help: IP address of the authoritative DNS server for this domain, e.g. '192.168.100.100'. To use a nondefault port for communication, append an '@' with the port number.

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).
